attributes.action: Insist that Universities provide a penny-for-penny breakdown of where the ridiculous fees students have to pay actually go.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Top-up fees have made Higher Education even more inaccessible for the less wealthy. Those of us who do choose to take the Tuition Fee loans and burden ourselves with the debt in the hope that it might further our careers want to know where our money goes. We demand a penny-for-penny breakdown of where our fees go, especially for courses where contact time is as little as 5 hours a week.
